title: MAGA Heat Check, Multiverse Thirst 04.26.22
itunes:title: MAGA Heat Check, Multiverse Thirst 04.26.22
description:
In episode 1234, Jack and Miles are joined by Brandie Posey to discuss… MAGA heating back up, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Georgia revenge race, why are people obsessed with the multiverse? and more!

  1. Trump’s Georgia GOP Revenge Plot Is Backfiring
  2. CLIP: CSPAN - Question to Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene
  3. Trump’s Most Loyal Lawmakers Are Actually Losing Money
  4. Why the Sliders Reboot Is in the Works at the Right Time
  5. You probably live in a parallel universe. Here’s why.
  6. Why the multiverse is 'Everywhere' right now, from 'Doctor Strange' to Michelle Yeoh's new movie

FOLLOW: @Brandazzle

Check Out: @PictureThisShow & @Lady2LadyComedy 

LISTEN: Brambleton by Pusha T

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
